Name: Statuette
Description: The rather crudely fashioned but brightly painted figure of Ptah-Sokar, standing on a base. The facial features are realistically painted with the details and wig in black. The body has spots of black, blue, yellow and red on a white background, a single vertical line of inscription is at the front. The pectoral ends in two stylised falcon heads. The pedestal is also decorated.
